values.name: Fruit You Should Be Eating Every Single Day
values.disription: Let's be honest here. The idea that you should choose one fruit over the other is actually kind of silly. There are a ton of health benefits to eating fruit on a regular basis—especially a variety of fruits. However, if you're looking for the best fruit to eat that will provide you with all kinds of nutrients in one serving, the answer would have to be raspberries. Why? Because raspberries are by far the best fruit to eat in terms of their high amount of dietary fiber.
